channel.description: Recent content in contribute on Collabora Online Development Edition - Community Page

item.title: Easy Hacks
item.description: These hacks have been determined to be great starting points for new developers on the project - when you visit the bug on our bug tracker you will find useful code pointers as well as at least one expert who will be available to help you if you have questions.

item.title: FAQ
item.description: Perhaps your question is one that we have been asked before; have a read, and let us know if not.

item.title: Found a bug?
item.description:
Great so let the bug hunting begin!

Please make sure you can reproduce the bug and identify the necessary steps to trigger it. Ideally use a new blank file (which may be useful later, as a test file) and also try to reproduce after resetting CODE preferences.

item.title: Translate ?
item.description: A great way to get involved. Perfecting CODE for your language, while learning about the feature set, and how things work can be fun.
